name: Scanning the QR code and viewing credential details
scenarioId: android/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel-Issue_Identity_attestations_65/photoIDCrossDevice:Scanning the QR code and viewing credential details
methodName: Scanning the QR code and viewing credential details

testSteps.description: Given the QR code scanner is activated
When the user scans a QR code from the issuer service
Then the details of the credential to be issued should be displayed including the type of credential and the issuer name

userStory.narrative:
As a user of the EUDI Wallet
  I want to request and store photo ID attestations in my EUDI Wallet
  So that I can identify myself using my EUDI Wallet in my travel user journey by presenting the requested attestations

title: Scanning the QR code and viewing credential details
